Control Statement: The organization: a. Physically controls and securely stores [Assignment: organization-defined types of digital and/or non-digital media] within [Assignment: organization-defined controlled areas]; andb. Protects information system media until the media are destroyed or sanitized using approved equipment, techniques, and procedures
